tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE concerts (
    concert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    concert_name VARCHAR(255),
    concert_date DATE,
    ticket_price DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE seating_arrangements (
    arrangement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    concert_id INT,
    seat_row INT,
    seat_number INT,
    is_available BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE ticket_sales (
    sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    concert_id INT,
    arrangement_id INT,
    sale_date TIMESTAMP,
    customer_name VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE seating_arrangements (
    seat_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    section VARCHAR(50),
    row INT,
    seat_number INT,
    ticket_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE concerts (
    concert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    concert_name VARCHAR(255),
    event_date TIMESTAMP,
    venue VARCHAR(100),
    genre VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE seating_arrangements (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    concert_id INT,
    section VARCHAR(50),
    seat_number INT,
    is_reserved BOOLEAN
);
